testcase.name: Login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to login page "https://adactinhotelapp.com/HotelAppBuild2/" build two.passed When User enters valid username SpheleleZ...................................passed And Enters valid password Nok2lasphe........................................passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed
